property.displayedProperties: ip[List of IPs] devdesc devclass[Node type]

property.description:
Hard Quota Threshold: A limit that cannot be exceeded. If an operation, such as a file write, causes a quota target to exceed a hard quota, the operation fails, an alert is logged to the cluster, and a notification is issued to any specified recipients.
Soft Quota Threshold: A limit that can be exceeded until a grace period has expired. When a soft quota is exceeded, data writes are permitted during the grace period. If the soft threshold is still exceeded when the grace period expires, data writes fail, and a hard-limit notification is issued to any specified recipients.
